page.title: 02MR. HARLAND
page.content: Mr Harland's parents retired from Scarborough to live in Green Hammerton.After they died Mr Harland bought their house.He went to work in Harrogate as a chainsaw salesman. He was sacked because he was not selling enough chainsaws.He wanted to start his own business.He converted his own garage into a work shop and showroom.Then he started repairing lawn mowers with the blacksmiths help. He thought "If I work in York it will be too far for the people in Harrogate to travel to me"The people will have to travel from York to Harrogate if I work in Harrogate.So it will not be too far to travel. Mr. Harland now has a thriving business with 18 people working for him. Six of these live in the village of Green Hammerton.
